title: [K-12] Copyright Issues in Generative AI Learning Data: Legal Reasoning Analysis and Practical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic copyright law, foundational understanding of generative AI trends, and experience in machine learning model development/utilization
context.additional_context: Practice-Oriented Education Focusing on Generative AI Applications in the Mathematics Domain

learning_goals: Learners can explain legal standards for determining copyright infringement in the data collection phase of generative AI learning.
Learners can distinguish copyright application methods for non-expressive and expressive machine learning stages.
Learners can analyze copyright issues of generative AI outputs before/after public release and propose appropriate licensing solutions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
